website_summaries.verdict: This traditional-sized kendama is intended for children ages 12 and up. It comes with a storage case, if they even decide to put it away.
cons: Cups can dent and chip over time as the wooden ball bangs against them

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 19 days of use
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this for his birthday. He has only used it for 19 days and today it broke. A big chunk of wood broke right off of it. He is an older teen who has only used it the way it was intended to be used. He was not rough on it at all. I am very disappointed in the lack of quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Keto4Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try out a bamboo kendama and at this price I had to go for it. The cups had a very slight wiggle that a drop of CA glue remedied. I put some beeswax-orange oil wood conditioner on it in a looks very nice. It’s a little heavier than I thought it would be, which is a good thing. It plays nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: Come on!!! You know kids are going to start playing with these toys right away and yet you put such cheap strings on them?! The Amazon web site had a cover that, of course, looked like it came with the order! It looked like it was part of the package or why else would it be showing on the web site? You need to make it right or I'll return it!
customer_reviews.author: Bette A.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and solid. This 'toy' is incredibly fun! Both my 11 year old son and I enjoy it. It is very challenging and rewarding as you get better with time and practice. You know it's fun when the boy puts his phone down to play with this (and won't give it up easily). I'll have to buy a second one for him. The extra string is nice. Both adults and kids can grip this well. YouTube has some good videos for beginners. I don't think I would recommend for little tikes. It is a ball on a string and would hurt if a small kids whacks himself with one.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzit

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: This was a good price and seems to be a good quality. I like that there is no paint that will chip off over time. My son (9) uses it daily and I have tired it a few times myself. The string seems sturdy and I think it will last a while. The color in person is more wood like and less ashen then I was expecting. I was expecting kind of a whitewashed look, but really that does not affect the product and it's playability.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Riendeau

customer_reviews.title: No drama with the Kendama
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The fact that it was hard to play with in the beginning made me spend time with it.... But now I get it... and I can’t put it down. I just want to buy more to collect too. This kendama was built well... and it looks easy to re-string if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome I love this kendama
customer_reviews.text: Shopping was on time came with holster and extra string the bamboo felt great I would recommend a thin layer of super glue or spoke armor on the Spike to get the most out of this kendama good price better than the cheapo 6 dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for older teenager. Challenging and fun at first;however, while you try to master the wood ball hits off the side of your hand. This becomes painful after a while and the wood dents from the wood ball. Quality is solid, smooth, and easy to hold. Case is great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jayne

customer_reviews.title: My boys and I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My boys and I love to play with this. It's challenging and fun to boot. If you youtube videos on how to use it, you'll find there are soooo many tricks that'll amaze friends. Great quality product and can take a beating. Thank you for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 12 year old son as a gift and he loves it. He loves good challenging tricks and he has been busy trying to learn all the different ones you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Urban

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for X-mas so can't say anything one way or the other just know that my grandson wanted it
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Layered pieces - arrived chipped.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One of the kendamas was chipped on one of the cups. I had to glue the piece back on and it’s a little off now.
customer_reviews.author: Fatheadluv

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who really enjoys it. It is a quality product and is at a great price point. I will definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: eval13

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: To note, I am a 22 yr old female who finds the most random things on amazon and has to try it. I have to say, this did not disappoint. I've gotten my friends and siblings to play along and just like me, they easily got latched. It's a fun little, study toy that is challenging but engaging. Have a try!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months and it chipped but I do play with it a lot at my desk and co-workers borrow it to. Even better its got stripes so easy to see when its spinning on the string so tricks are easier. Also it still works even with the chip
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful looking Kendama
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking Kendama. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. The only problem is my current inability to catch the ball. Hopefully this is only temporary. I also don't see how to use the holder type thing, for which there is no instruction.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Good toy and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Recommend! This kendama feels very nice and well made. My first kendama accidentally chipped in few days, but the company quickly sent me replacement after I told them the problem. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Garburator

customer_reviews.title: Average but works
customer_reviews.text: Finish isn't very smooth, holster is too loose to hold it all together, and both holsters (we ordered two) arrived with black marks that we can't get off.
customer_reviews.author: Westfall North

customer_reviews.title: Once he said "if you can get the spike in less than 10 tries I'll go to the store for you" I got it in 8 and enjoyed the look on
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son in college. He loves it and is constantly challenging himself and me. Once he said "if you can get the spike in less than 10 tries I'll go to the store for you" I got it in 8 and enjoyed the look on his face!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: who has gotten pretty expert with the smaller one
customer_reviews.text: This is a step up in difficulty from the smaller, lighter version, so my son, who has gotten pretty expert with the smaller one, had a nice challenge here. Love this product as an alternative to the constant screen/electronic toy culture (even though we have those, too) - really engages everyone, even the teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: bhakti

customer_reviews.title: Tie the string better on the ken.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this 5 minutes ago, and it already broke from the ball. I'm a bit disappointed that this happened. though it does work well, and balances good. Though the company should fix the problem with the sting being to small of a tie. though they do give you extra sting, It just seems that they should make it so that you don't have to replace the string for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kendama
customer_reviews.text: Fun Toy to mess around with, good quality for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Gray Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I saw this "toy" on a PBS show about Japan ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this "toy" on a PBS show about Japan and it looked intriguing. Have had it for just 2 days and it has already gotten my 6 year old away from watching minecraft videos on his computer for a while. That's significant since he only gets on the PC for an hour a day. I guess now he'll be watching kendama videos.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm Taylor

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: i dont really plaay with it just got it for an event and seems like alot of people have it.
customer_reviews.author: randy chao

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a toy drive at work, so I haven't used it and will never know the recipient. I chose this product because there's no paint to chip off and it comes with extra string. When it arrived I discovered that it's also solid and well-balanced. I'm quite pleased with the purchase, but can't review it as a user.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Forgione

customer_reviews.title: Wood Chipped within 5 hours of Useage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old spent hours playing with this the first day he received it. The only issue we had is that the “big cup” chipped within 5 hours of “normal” (not rough) usage. I was hoping for better quality and my son was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Patience is a virtue
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. It's both a stressor and stress-reliever at the same time. I am a beginner at this but have enjoyed every bit of it. This teaches patience and humility. It is very well-made and should last a lifetime, if used properly and with care.

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! There are no returns on this item. It is extremely hard to maneuver, which becomes very frustrating. Think twice before purchasing!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as awesome as the photo. Very good quality and the price was right! Great communication from the seller/creator. Wouldn't hesitate to do business with in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool and made well but Too tough for kids:(
customer_reviews.text: Really cool and made well but Too tough for kids:(

customer_reviews.text: this kendama sucks..... I got it two days ago and the cup part of it is already chipping apart. Now I got to gorilla glue it back together. I rate this product 1 out of 10 would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun toy for anyone no matter the age. I gave this to my grandfather and it was literally the only thing everyone wanted to play with at the party.

customer_reviews.title: great toy!

customer_reviews.title: They loved it! It is definitely what the description says

When the kids opened it, they immediately began playing with it and were hooked. They loved it! It is definitely what the description says. It is made of quality wood, and I like the bare wood, as I read the painted ones end up chipping. Evidently this is the craze right now even with high school kids, as my freshman daughter wished she got one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Buy again??  YES!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for 10-year old grandson. Taking alot of practice time for him to master the more difficult tricks. Very well constructed and wood is holding up great. Would buy again. Received at a discount in return for an honest review.

customer_reviews.title: I'm terrible at this thing

customer_reviews.title: It was in brand new condition when it arrived and it has held up much better than the black one I bought at the same ...

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It and the Holster

customer_reviews.title: Layered and glued not so good
customer_reviews.text: Looked cool and thought bamboo would be great. Because it’s layered bamboo that was lathed it’s only as strong as the glue that holds the layers together. After using it one time the side of one of the cups broke off never to be found. Sending back....

customer_reviews.title: As described

product_meta.title: Kotaro Pro Bamboo Kendama Toy with Extra String
product_meta.description:
If you’re looking for the BEST bamboo kendama on the market, buy the Kotaro Kendama brand. Made of laminated bamboo parts, Kotaro Kendamas are designed for high level kendama play. 

With enough practice, you’ll be doing all your favorite tricks like Oozara (big cup), Kozara (small cup), Chuuzara (base cup) and Rousoku (candle). Use grips like the Sara (or Pen) Grip, the Ken Grip, the Tama Grip or the Rousoku Grip. 

The deluxe Kotaro Kendama model comes with a bamboo ball (the tama or dama), a pre-strung length of string, and the Ken, or handle with three cups. Also comes with one extra string! They were historically a Japanese skill toy. 

Improve your hand eye coordination, speed up your reflexes and improve your balancing techniques. As you learn how to use the kendama better and better, you’ll build skills like patience and focus and enter the magical state of flow. Named After Fuma Kotaro, the Japanese ninja. Some people mistakenly call them cadoma, cadama, kentama, kandamas, kindamas and kondoma or kondomas. 

What else makes the Kotaro Kendama better? 

Bamboo seems like wood, but it’s actually a grass! It grows back extremely quickly, so it’s very sustainable. 

Manufactured in Asia by a toy company that has been in business making bamboo and wooden toys for 14 years. 

Extremely sweet looking and stable handle. Nice, deep and perfectly angled cups. 

Laser engraved logo. 

Ages 12 and up.
